description:
It’s unclear what the people of Dallas were thinking when they elected Jasmine Crockett to represent them, but we now know how she got hired as a public defender.

According to Crockett, she demanded her former manager hire her as a public defender with zero experience for one reason and one reason only; the color of her skin.

🚨JASMINE CROCKETT: “When I first became a public defender, I had NO CRIMINAL DEFENSE EXPERIENCE!”

“I said you should hire me…because I’m black!” pic.twitter.com/s10QV49Ey0
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) April 2, 2025
title: Jasmine Crockett does the most Jasmine Crockett thing ever, not only admits but BRAGS she's another DEI hire

description:
Whenever there is bureaucracy, you get useless employees paid to do nothing. So while it’s unclear why Brown University needs “one administrator for every two undergrads,” it’s evident that this may or may not have something to do with bureaucracy running deep.

One Brown student was curious why he pays nearly $100,000 in tuition and fees annually while “the annual budget deficit is $46 million.” This is why he put his DOGE hat on and did what he felt needed to be done, and demanded that faculty prove they are not useless buffoons getting paid to sit around all day. It’s unclear if anyone was able to do so, but now the university is victim-blaming the student and investigating him rath
title: Ivy League student inspired by D.O.G.E. demands administrators answer, “What do you do all day?” Now he's under investigation...

description:
President Trump unveiled his latest plan for tariffs at a “Make America Wealthy Again” event on Wednesday. Today’s show breaks down the numbers and countries hit hardest.

"There is no rational argument that they make," Crowder said. "No one would have an interest in taking their economy, guaranteeing that their legacy is tarnished forever and their party has no chance at the midterms."
title: Watch: Will Trump's Tariffs Save America or Destroy the Economy?

description:
German police get deep into a murder investigation before the case takes a twist not even Sherlock Holmes could see coming. A stabbing death in Frisco goes largely uncovered by the mainstream media, and we think you know the reason.

Liberation Day has come and tariffs are rolling out. We dive into the equations, regulations, numbers and countries that are hardest hit.

GERMAN COPS FIND MURDER VICTIM?

  • Rostock police inves
title: Liberation Day: How Trump's Tariff Strategy Will Reset the Global Order (Sources)

description:
We all knew this was coming. After years of being told by journalismers not to believe our lying eyes as we watch Joe Biden cognitively decline, now that he is out of office, the stories can "suddenly" be told. And we're supposed to be these journalismers had no idea of any of this prior, because they are patriots who take their jouralisming seriously. They would never keep important information from the American people about the President of the United States not knowing where he is, how all these people got in his room, or who pooped his pants.

This clip of two such jouralismers writing such a book is making the rounds. I'm not going to name them or the book, because f*ck them and f*ck their book. But here they are discussing how Joe Biden was so bad -- HOW BAD WAS HE? -- he was so bad, he needed fluorescent arrows on the floor OF
title: Now it can be told! A reporter's book about senile Joe Biden needing to be led around someone's home will infuriate you

description:
CNN's Scott Jennings presented a theory of the 80/20 issue, in that any time Donald Trump or the GOP support an issue that eighty percent of Americans support, Democrats get baited into supporting the twenty percent over their allegiance to the most Marxist far-left lunatics on their side. Exhibit Q: In a Georgia debate over banning "gender" "affirming "care" for prisoners, House Democrats would rather stomp their feet, storming out of the chamber.

Yes. "Gender" "affirming" "care." For prisoners.

I know that you know that
title: House Democrats would rather STORM OFF than vote to end "gender" "affirming" "care" for prisoners
